text: Atahpara yakhana tomara kapheradera sathe yud'dhe abatirna ha'o, takhana tadera gardara mara, abasese yakhana taË¦#2503;darake purnarupe parabhuta kara takhana taderake sakta kare bedhe phela. Atahpara haya tadera prati anugraha kara, na haya tadera nikata hate muktipana la'o. Tomara yud'dha caliye yabe ye paryanta na satrupaksa astra samarpana karabe! Ekatha sunale. Allaha iccha karale tadera kacha theke pratisodha nite paratena. Kintu tini tomadera katakake katakera dbara pariksa karate cana. Yara allahara pathe sahida haya, allaha kakhana'i tadera karma binasta karabena na.
